ing: 1 cup pineapple juice, or more to taste
des: "This green drink is mighty! This wonderful energizer is perfect for the morning pick-me-up and even better after a good workout. Don't let the ingredients and color fool you, this drink is absolutely delicious! Pour into a tall glass and enjoy!"
ins: Blend kale, spinach, parsley, pineapple juice, and pineapple in a blender until smooth.
